References¶

Flassbeck21

S. Flassbeck and J. Asslander (2021), Minimization of eddy current related artefacts in hybrid-state sequences, in Proceedings of the 2021 ISMRM and SMRT annual meeting and exhibition.

Asslander19a

D. K. S. Jakob Asslander (2019), Quantitative magnetization transfer imaging in the hybrid state

Asslander19b

Assländer, J., Novikov, D.S., Lattanzi, R. et al. (2019), Hybrid-state free precession in nuclear magnetic resonance, Commun Phys 2, 73. <https://doi.org/10.1038/s42005-019-0174-0>.

Henkelman93

R. M. Henkelman, X. Huang, Q.-S. Xiang, G. Stanisz, S. D. Swanson, and M. J. Bronskill (1993), Quantitative interpretation of magnetization transfer, Magnetic resonance in medicine, vol. 29, no. 6, pp. 759–766.
